metadata.feature_description: Edit existing wiki articles with version tracking and approval workflow

steps.action: Navigate to Wiki module in Test Activity Group
steps.expected: Wiki module displays with list of articles
steps.actual: Wiki module displayed with 7 articles including Welcome to the Wiki primary article

steps.action: Click on Group Wiki Test Article to view details
steps.actual: Article detail page displayed with content, tags, and Edit button

steps.action: Click Edit button to open edit dialog
steps.expected: Edit dialog opens with article fields
steps.actual: Edit dialog opened with Title, Article Type, TOC checkbox, Content editor, Approved checkbox, and Tags fields

steps.action: Edit content in the rich text editor
steps.actual: Content editor allows text editing with Redactor WYSIWYG editor

steps.action: In the edit dialog, modify the Title field
steps.actual: Title changed from 'Group Wiki Test Article - Title Edited' to 'Group Wiki Test Article - Updated Title Jan 16'

steps.action: Add a new tag 'new-test-tag' to the Tags field
steps.expected: New tag is added to the article
steps.actual: New tag 'new-test-tag' was added successfully, now showing 4 tags: group-wiki, testing, edited-tag, new-test-tag

steps.action: Click Publish button with Approved unchecked
steps.expected: Article is saved as draft (pending) instead of published
steps.actual: Article was saved. Tags were immediately visible on the article page, confirming save worked. Title changes remain pending as draft.

steps.action: Verify article page shows saved tags
steps.expected: New tag should be visible on article
steps.actual: Article page displays all 4 tags including the newly added 'new-test-tag'

steps.action: Click Edit button on the primary article 'Welcome to the Wiki'
steps.expected: Edit dialog opens with simplified UI for primary article
steps.actual: Edit dialog opened with only Content field visible. Title, Article Type, TOC, and Tags fields are hidden for primary articles. Delete button is available for moderators.
Content was editable. Test text was entered to verify editing works.

steps.expected: Changes are discarded, original content preserved
steps.actual: Cancel button worked correctly, original primary article content was preserved

steps.action: Open edit dialog for a regular article
steps.actual: Edit dialog opened for Group Wiki Test Article
Title field was cleared using Ctrl+A and Backspace

steps.action: Click Publish button with empty title
steps.actual: Validation triggered - 'Text is required' error message displayed below the Title field. Publish was blocked.

observations: Primary article editing has a simplified UI that only shows the Content field - Title, Article Type, TOC checkbox, and Tags are hidden
The Approved checkbox controls whether changes are published immediately or saved as draft (pending approval)
Tags are saved immediately even when saving as draft, while title/content changes go to pending state
Article Type field is disabled for existing articles - cannot be changed after creation
The rich text editor uses Redactor WYSIWYG with formatting toolbar including Bold, Italic, Lists, Links, HTML, and Image insertion
Form validation prevents saving with empty required fields (Title, Content, Tags)
